name: PCSX2 Emulador

files.dark: N/A:Se√±ala el instalador, solo para iniciar

content:
files:
- dark: "N/A:Se\xF1ala el instalador, solo para iniciar"
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/PCSX2 1.4.0/pcsx2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/PCSX2 1.4.0/
installer:
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: win7
    description: Cambiando a Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx11_42
    description: Installing DirectX 11
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    description: Installing DirectX 11
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_42
    description: Installing d3dcompiler42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing d3dcompiler43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    description: Installing d3dcompiler47
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
